reviews.review_msg: Great Instructor. Really tries to engage with students and makes class more fun with mini field trips around campus and such. Always loves to throw in a joke or two especially when he could tell we were stressed out with other classes

Rudy is an exceptional prof and a super nice person. Definitely the most approachable and kind professor at SFU. Always willing to help. Peppers lectures with humour and fun facts and stories of the cool things he's done. 10/10.

I liked this class, but Rudy doesn't provide feedback. Only approachable in class and good luck getting a hold of him otherwise. We were left clueless as to what he expected of us. We didn't get ANY assignment grades back period. We only saw our course grade posted on Go SFU and oddly everyone I talked to received the same grade...

This prof is not clear as to what he is expecting when assigning things. He is very disorganized, and is not helpful outside of class time. He marks super slow and tough, and needs to be reminded to explain assignments.
Was very helpful and willing to talk to students about material. You can tell his interest in the course content is high! Would recommend this class with Rudy!
